a.n: Royal Southern Brotherhood: Live at La Traverse

p.k: A spectacular gathering with the powerful rhythms of New Orleans and Southern rock. The band, led by Cyril Neville, Bart Walker and Tyrone Vaughan, is supported brilliantly by Yonrico Scott and Charlie Wooton.
p.d: A spectacular gathering with the powerful rhythms of New Orleans and Southern rock. These musicians have one thing in common: sharing their passion for music. They create an incredible mix of genres like funk, folk, electro, and blues. The band, led by Cyril Neville, Bart Walker and Tyrone Vaughan, is supported brilliantly by Yonrico Scott and Charlie Wooton.
